hootboard:
At Hootboard, I served as a Software Engineer from May 2023 to September 2024,
 where I developed offline functionality for kiosks, resulting in a 30% increase in feature adoption.
  I led the design of multi-zone layouts for digital signage, enhancing content display and receiving 
  positive feedback from clients. Additionally, I migrated projects from Create React App to Vite 
  and integrated Shadcn across various platforms, including the official website and CityGuide app.
   My role involved implementing third-party integrations for CityGuide, collaborating closely with
    clients to deliver tailored solutions, monitoring kiosks through remote management software, 
and managing production releases for multiple projects. Through these efforts, I contributed
 to improving user experience and operational efficiency at Hootboard.
versai:
At Homejam, I contributed to the development
				 of the frontend UI for a product that enables users to enjoy concerts
				  directly from their mobile phones. Utilizing a tech stack that 
				  included ReactJS, TypeScript, PostgreSQL, and Strapi, I focused 
				  on creating an engaging and user-friendly experience, ensuring
				   seamless access to live music events through the application.
zivaka: I independently developed a comprehensive website for a construction company using pure JavaScript, HTML, and CSS, delivering a solution that precisely aligned with the client's specifications. Additionally, I enhanced several other projects by updating and refining their user interfaces with ReactJS and TypeScript, significantly improving usability and overall functionality.
